mapper.select: select c.id, c.address_id, c.visible_status, c.camping_start_time, c.camping_end_time, c.camping_participant, c.total_amount, c.remark, c.create_by, c.create_time, c.update_by, c.update_time, cac.comment, cac.score from camping c left join camping_user_relation cur on c.id = cur.camping_id left join camping_address_comment cac on c.id = cac.camping_id where cur.user_id = #{item.userId} and c.delete_flag = 0;
